T

THRESHOLDDEFAULTVALUE - Static variable in class src.java.constants.Constants
The default value of the threshold that limits the results of the queries
tokenize(String) - Method in class src.java.corpus.tokenizer.ComplexTokenizer
This implementation of the tokenizer function takes the content of a document, converts its characters to lower case, removes all non-alphanumeric characters, excess space characters and splits the content by whitespaces.
tokenize(String) - Method in class src.java.corpus.tokenizer.SimpleTokenizer
This implementation uses simple String manipulation to remove all non-alphabetic characters, eliminate words with three characters or less and set all the characters to lower case.
tokenize(String) - Method in interface src.java.corpus.tokenizer.Tokenizer
This functions uses a String to extract a List os tokens/words.
Tokenizer - Interface in src.java.corpus.tokenizer
An Object the implements the tokenizer.tokenizer interface has to breakdown a String into several tokens using a certain set of rules which the Object is free to chose.
